Class com.polk.appointment.Employee

public class Employee
extends Object
implements Schedulable, Identifiable, Component_Interface
The person doing the scheduling. Also, can be a schedulee.

Employee()

cancels_time_slot(Time_Slot)
Remove this time slot from the employee's list.
confirm_ui()
This routine tells the object to get all of the information from the ui elements it gave the controller, verify it, and return an Identity.
confirms_time_slot(Time_Slot)
Given a time slot, is the employee free?
key()
Used to keep track of the employee elsewhere.
main(String[])
Main puts up the login dialog, which is the first dialog the user sees.
new_meeting()
An employee can create a new meeting, which will ask the user for a list of attendees.
proxy()
A user interface component to add to a dialog.
toString()
Displays the employee's name and schedule.

Used to keep track of the employee elsewhere.

Identity
confirm_ui 
 public Identity confirm_ui()
This routine tells the object to get all of the information from the ui elements it gave the controller, verify it, and return an Identity. Returns null if there is invalid data.

new_meeting 
 public void new_meeting()
An employee can create a new meeting, which will ask the user for a list of attendees.

proxy 
 public Component proxy()
A user interface component to add to a dialog. Has components to enter relevant data. In this case, first and last name.

See Also:
Component_Interface
main 
 public static void main(String args[])
Main puts up the login dialog, which is the first dialog the user sees. He must input his first and last name. If he is not in the database, the dialog complains, and he can try again. Cancel quits the program.
